0.4.0 (07-12-2020)
------------------

- Py3 migratie (#53)

0.3.0 (12-04-2016)
------------------

- Added http caching to the `/uris` endpoint.

0.2.0 (28-09-2015)
------------------

- Added a `/uris` endpoint that does not redirect, but just returns information.

0.1.0 (27-09-2015)
------------------

- Initial version
- Allows redirecting a a regular URI and with a query service.
